short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the current bitcoin (or ethereum) price on your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a very simple ticker that will show the current Bitcoin (or Ethereum) conversion rate in your toolbar (right on the icon). It is based on the price at api.bitcoinaverage.com, which is a weighted average of all the exchange prices. It currently only supports USD, GBP, and EUR.
